thread.title: Pat Bowlen to be inducted in Broncos Ring of Fame at halftime Sunday
thread.title_full: Pat Bowlen to be inducted in Broncos Ring of Fame at halftime Sunday

author:
Nicki Jhabvala 
The Denver Post
title: Pat Bowlen to be inducted in Broncos Ring of Fame at halftime Sunday
text:
Pat Bowlen to be inducted in Broncos Ring of Fame at halftime Sunday Indoor facility at UC Health Training Center to be named Pat Bowlen Fieldhouse Posted: 10/26/2015 03:22:01 PM MDT Denver Broncos owner Pat Bowlen. ( John Leyba, The Denver Post ) Bronco Bus fan forum 
Longtime Broncos owner Pat Bowlen will be inducted into the team's Ring of Fame during halftime of Sunday's game, and many members of the 1997 Super Bowl team will be on hand for the ceremony. 
As part of the week-long celebration, the Broncos will hold a dedication, naming the indoor facility at UC Health Training Center the Pat Bowlen Fieldhouse. Manning practice schedule 
Since Kubiak took over as the Broncos' coach, he has mandated a day of rest each week for quarterback Peyton Manning and other veterans to keep them fresh for game days, but especially for later in the season. 
Kubiak doesn't expect to change that this week after an extended rest period with the bye. But having Manning practice Wednesday remains a possibility. 
"We're going to talk about that," Kubiak said. "I would say no, but he's had some good rest, so we'll see. I think he will practice some on Wednesday. How much, I don't know." Footnotes 
Sunday's matchup between the Broncos and Packers will be the first prime-time game featuring opponents with records of 6-0 or better. ... Green Bay quarterback Aaron Rodgers and Manning are the only players in NFL history to average more than two touchdown passes per game. Advertisement
